bug.author: FritzTheBat
bug.description:
Loading the new german md model produces this error for me. Loading the french model 2.1.0a0 works fine, so there might be somthing wrong with the model. <denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>running</denchmark-h>
import spacy spacyDe = spacy.load('de_core_news_md') <denchmark-h:h3>results in</denchmark-h>
ValueError Traceback (most recent call last) in () 1 import spacy ----> 2 spacyDe = spacy.load('de_core_news_md') /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/init.py in load(name, **overrides) 13 if depr_path not in (True, False, None): 14 deprecation_warning(Warnings.W001.format(path=depr_path)) ---> 15 return util.load_model(name, **overrides) 16 17 /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/util.py in load_model(name, **overrides) 111 if isinstance(name, basestring_): # in data dir / shortcut 112 if name in set([d.name for d in data_path.iterdir()]): --> 113 return load_model_from_link(name, **overrides) 114 if is_package(name): # installed as package 115 return load_model_from_package(name, **overrides) /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/util.py in load_model_from_link(name, **overrides) 128 except AttributeError: 129 raise IOError(Errors.E051.format(name=name)) --> 130 return cls.load(**overrides) 131 132 /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/data/de_core_news_md/init.py in load(**overrides) 10 11 def load(**overrides): ---> 12 return load_model_from_init_py(file, **overrides) /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/util.py in load_model_from_init_py(init_file, **overrides) 172 if not model_path.exists(): 173 raise IOError(Errors.E052.format(path=path2str(data_path))) --> 174 return load_model_from_path(data_path, meta, **overrides) 175 176 /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/util.py in load_model_from_path(model_path, meta, **overrides) 155 component = nlp.create_pipe(name, config=config) 156 nlp.add_pipe(component, name=name) --> 157 return nlp.from_disk(model_path) 158 159 /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/language.py in from_disk(self, path, disable) 657 if not (path / 'vocab').exists(): 658 exclude['vocab'] = True --> 659 util.from_disk(path, deserializers, exclude) 660 self._path = path 661 return self /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/util.py in from_disk(path, readers, exclude) 551 for key, reader in readers.items(): 552 if key not in exclude: --> 553 reader(path / key) 554 return path 555 /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy/language.py in (p) 645 ('meta.json', lambda p: self.meta.update(util.read_json(p))), 646 ('vocab', lambda p: ( --> 647 self.vocab.from_disk(p) and _fix_pretrained_vectors_name(self))), 648 ('tokenizer', lambda p: self.tokenizer.from_disk(p, vocab=False)), 649 )) vocab.pyx in spacy.vocab.Vocab.from_disk() strings.pyx in spacy.strings.StringStore.from_disk() strings.pyx in spacy.strings.StringStore.from_disk() ValueError: Unexpected character found when decoding array value (2) <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.1.0a0 Platform: Linux-4.9.87-linuxkit-aufs-x86_64-with-debian-stretch-sid Python version: 3.6.3 Models: fr_core_news_md, de_core_news_md, en_core_web_m

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. Could you paste the values you get from locale?

That would be: LC_MONETARY="en_US.UTF-8" LC_MESSAGES="en_US.UTF-8" LC_PAPER="en_US.UTF-8" LC_NAME="en_US.UTF-8" LC_ADDRESS="en_US.UTF-8" LC_TELEPHONE="en_US.UTF-8" LC_MEASUREMENT="en_US.UTF-8" LC_IDENTIFICATION="en_US.UTF-8" LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 Cheers
Should be fixed in the latest nightly models: pip install -U spacy-nightly python -m spacy download de_core_news_md If you still come across an issue, feel free to reopen!
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
